messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: Guess Im your Captain for the time being guys, suit sensors up and don't break too much.

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: If yall fuckers think I'm rouge you better have some proof

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Aft Primary Hallway.
